name: Prayer Beads
desc: Grows by gaining experience, storing 20% (+5% per stack) bonus stats ( health , regeneration , and damage ). On removal, gain all stored stats.
notes:
Prayer Beads is an item in Risk of Rain 2, added in the Seekers of the Storm expansion.
The item passively gains 100% (+25% per item stack) experience alongside the player. Upon reaching a certain threshold, a stack of   Prayer Beads Buff is obtained. Upon removing Prayer Beads from the inventory (through scrappers, printers, or cauldrons), the player will gain 20% (+5% per item stack) of their health, regen, and damage per level for each stack of the buff.


== Notes ==
The item gains -2.5% experience for every stack of   Prayer Beads Buff that was previously consumed by the player (via removal of Prayer Beads).
The experience gained by this item cannot go below 20% (+5% per item stack).
If the player transforms into the   Heretic after removing Prayer Beads, the stat buff granted will use the original survivor's stats instead of the Heretic's. However, transforming before removing the item will make it use the Heretic's stats as expected.
  Solus Extractors can steal the item from the player, granting the stats upgrade when stolen. Killing them will return the item while retaining the upgrade, allowing a second usage of it.
